heading: Is Dark Soy Sauce gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Dark Soy Sauce and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Dark soy sauce often contains wheat as a primary ingredient, which poses a gluten risk for individuals with coeliac disease. However, some varieties may be gluten-free, so careful selection is essential.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
